Summary: Pre-Commercial Procurement of an Innovative Systemic Sustainability Transition Solution for Health Care Organisations (Suhco). Description: Procurement will take the form of pre-commercial procurement (PCP), where R&D service contracts will be awarded in parallel to different R&D providers in a phased approach. This will allow alternative, competing solutions to be compared. Each selected operator will receive a framework contract covering three R&D phases. The three phases are: Solution design, prototype development, original development and validation and testing of a limited volume of the first products or services. After each phase, interim evaluations are conducted to select the best of the competing solutions. The contractors with the best value for money will be offered a specific contract for the next phase. The selected operators will retain ownership of the intellectual property rights (IPRs) they generate during the PCP and will be able to use them to exploit the full market potential of the solutions developed. All interested operators are invited to take part in the upcoming open market consultation (regardless of their geographic location , the size or governance structure of their organisation). The open market consultation will be organised in the form of a series of meetings. It will provide you with an overview of the procurement objectives, the PCP process and the main clauses of the contract. You will also have the opportunity to ask questions. The first series of meetings will be held online or hybrid by each of the procurers mentioned under Section I.1). During those meetings, the procurers .... Tender Value: 2260980. Currency: EUR. Summary: English Language Training Services in the Basic Training Course for Police Officers in 2026, as Well as Individual Conversation Sessions in English, for Commanders. Description: Description of the service: The purpose of the contract is twofold:- Lot 1: teaching police technical English to the students of the basic training course for police officers with the aim of carrying out the most frequent police actions in the English language. The contracting company will have to provide training in two phases: - Online format following the requirements of the teaching pia of the ISPC English language course. - Face-to-face format with a fundamentally practical orientation where the contents will be put into practice worked in the online training phase.- Lot 2: teaching in English to improve the fluency and oral communicative competence of the commands, through individualized conversation sessions.. output.Description: Description of the service: The purpose of the contract is twofold:- Lot 1: teaching police technical English to the students of the basic training course for police officers with the aim of carrying out the most frequent police actions in the English language. The contracting company will have to provide training in two phases: - Online format following the requirements of the teaching pia of the ISPC English language course. - Face-to-face format with a fundamentally practical orientation where the contents will be put into practice worked in the online training phase.- Lot 2: teaching in English to improve the fluency and oral communicative competence of the commands, through individualized conversation sessions.

All this, within the configuration of the protection centers such as environments Insurance and good treatment, which is referred to in Organic Law 8/2021, of June 4, on Integral Protection to Children and Adolescents against violence (hereinafter, Lopivi).<br> The places awarded in this Framework Agreement, once contracted by virtue of the contracts that are They derive, will be integrated within the public network of minors protection centers, under the DGIFFN of the Ministry of Family, Youth and Social Affairs.<br> Attention to devices between 5 and 12 places<br> Attention to devices between 40 and 50 places.<br> Doc Title: Residential foster care of half stay of unaccompanied foreign minors attended by the General Directorate of Children, Family and Birth Promotion<br> Contract Type: services.
